title: BC如何跨服
author: Q495145295
txt_content:
献上全部金粒求大神帮忙，我的是网页后台，怎么安装BC啊，还有配置文件怎么弄，以下↓__↓是我的配置文件
groups:
  md_5:
  - admin
disabled_commands:
- disabledcommandhere
player_limit: -1
stats: 826b5a2c-9321-43e7-8fe9-7cb283f105ba
permissions:
  default:
  - bungeecord.command.server
  - bungeecord.command.list
  admin:
  - bungeecord.command.alert
  - bungeecord.command.end
  - bungeecord.command.ip
  - bungeecord.command.reload
listeners:
- max_players: 1
  fallback_server: lobby
  host: 0.0.0.0:25565
  bind_local_address: true
  ping_passthrough: false
  tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
  default_server: lobby
  forced_hosts:
    pvp.md-5.net: pvp
  tab_size: 60
  force_default_server: false
  motd: '&1Another Bungee server'
  query_enabled: false
  query_port: 25565
timeout: 30000
connection_throttle: 4000
servers:yx6.scrsksw.com：25586
  lobby:
    address: localhost:25586
    restricted: false
    motd: QAQ
ip_forward: false
online_mode: false
